item.text: When humankind began to multiply on the face of the earth, and daughters were born to them,

the <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">humankind</st> were <st data-num="02896" class="">beautiful</st>. <st data-num="02007" class="">Thus</st> they <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> for themselves from <st data-num="03605 0834">any</st> they <st data-num="0977" class="">chose</st>.
So the Lord said, “My Spirit will not remain in humankind indefinitely, since they are mortal. They will remain for 120 more years.”

The Nephilim were on the earth in those days (and also after this) when the sons of God would sleep with the daughters of humankind, who gave birth to their children. They were the mighty heroes of old, the famous men.
But the Lord saw that the wickedness of humankind had become great on the earth. Every inclination of the thoughts of their minds was only evil all the time.
The Lord regretted that he had made humankind on the earth, and he was highly offended.

So the Lord said, “I will wipe humankind, whom I have created, from the face of the earth—everything from humankind to animals, including creatures that move on the ground and birds of the air, for I regret that I have made them.”
But Noah found favor in the sight of the Lord.

This is the account of Noah.

Noah was a godly man; he was blameless among his contemporaries. He walked with God.
Noah had three sons: Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
The earth was ruined in the sight of God; the earth was filled with violence.

<st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">indeed</st><n id="1" /> it was <st data-num="07843" class="">ruined</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">living creatures</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="07843 01870">were sinful</st>.<n id="4" />

So <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="05146" class="">Noah</st>, “I have <st data-num="0935 06440">decided</st> that <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">living creatures</st> must <st data-num="07093" class="">die</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="04390" class="">is filled with</st> <st data-num="02555" class="">violence</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">because of</st> them. <st data-num="02005" class="">Now</st> I am about to <st data-num="07843" class="">destroy</st><n id="3" /> them <st data-num="0854" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.

<st data-num="06213" class="">Make</st><n id="1" /> for yourself an <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> of <st data-num="01613" class="">cypress</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="06086" class="">wood</st>. <st data-num="06213" class="">Make</st> <st data-num="07064" class="">rooms</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st>, and <st data-num="03722" class="">cover</st><n id="3" /> it with <st data-num="03724" class="">pitch</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">inside</st> and <st data-num="02351" class="">out</st>.

<st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> is <st data-num="0834" class="">how</st> you should <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> it: The <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> is to be <st data-num="07969 03967 0520">450 feet</st> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st>, <st data-num="02572 0520">75 feet</st> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>, and <st data-num="07970 0520">45 feet</st> <st data-num="06967" class="">high</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="06213" class="">Make</st> a <st data-num="06672" class="">roof</st> for the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> and <st data-num="03615" class="">finish</st> it, <st data-num="0413" class="">leaving</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">18 inches</st><n id="1" /> from the <st data-num="04605" class="">top</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07760" class="">Put</st> a <st data-num="06607" class="">door</st> in the <st data-num="06654" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st>, and <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08482" class="">lower</st>, <st data-num="08145" class="">middle</st>, and <st data-num="07992" class="">upper</st> decks.

<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="02005" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03999 04325">floodwaters</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> to <st data-num="07843" class="">destroy</st><n id="3" /> from <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01320" class="">living creatures</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> have the <st data-num="07307" class="">breath</st> of <st data-num="02416" class="">life</st> in them.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">Everything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is on the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> will <st data-num="01478" class="">die</st>,

but I will <st data-num="06965" class="">confirm</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you. You will <st data-num="0935 0413">enter</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st>—<st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, your <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, your <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, and your <st data-num="01121" class="">sons’</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you.

You must <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="08392" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="08147 03605">two</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">every kind of</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">living creature</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> and <st data-num="05347 01961">female</st>, to <st data-num="02421" class="">keep</st> them <st data-num="02421" class="">alive</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you.

Of the <st data-num="05775" class="">birds</st> after their <st data-num="04327" class="">kinds</st>, and <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="0929" class="">cattle</st> after their <st data-num="04327" class="">kinds</st>, and of <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="07431" class="">creeping thing</st> of the <st data-num="0127" class="">ground</st> after its <st data-num="04327" class="">kind</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">every kind</st> will <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you so you can <st data-num="02421" class="">keep</st> them <st data-num="02421" class="">alive</st>.<n id="1" />
And you must take for yourself every kind of food that is eaten, and gather it together. It will be food for you and for them.”
And Noah did all that God commanded him—he did indeed.
